long_description:
This Texture Pack offers realistic and fantastic elements combined in a high resolution package (256px).

I've worked on it for quite a while and the development will go on (actively developed).

All of the graphics are made by myself or were selected from OpenGameArt (CC0 license).

I offer my Texture Pack under the CC BY-SA 4.0 license.

(compatible with VoxeLibre and Minetest Game)

NOTICE: PLEASE ACTIVATE MIPMAPPING IN ORDER TO GET THE BEST GAMING EXPERIENCE!
name: realfantasy
short_description: A Texture Pack that combines realistic and fantastic elements. (compatible with VoxeLibre and Minetest Game)
title: Real Fantasy
